name: PowerCenter:Avoid too many Tasks per Workflow
description:
Workflow should have less than X Tasks.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all Workflows having more than X Tasks.
It provides the following information:
Workflow full name, number of Tasks
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, Workflow should not have too many Tasks.
remediation: Review the Workflow design to reduce the number of Tasks and try to use Worklet whenever it's possible.
total: Total number of Workflows and Worklets
